Name: Udjat-eye
Description: The udjat-eye depicts an open human eye to which some extra elements have been added. The amulet is connected with the celestial deity in the shape of a falcon and therefore also with the king. It is one of the most popular amulets and was not just used in the funerary cult.This udjat-eye of green faience is a right eye in raised relief. Pupil and brow are painted black.
